caption:
At @bombaybrowbar we love our customers, and we’re happy that our customers love us too! 😍.

With 4️⃣ locations to serve our Vancouver community, each Bombay experience is always a little different. Both in atmosphere, as well as the lovely staff who each put their own personal touch to their personalized service!.

These reviews are just a few things our customers have said about each of our locations; and each location has benefits and conveniences all their own! ➡️.

🌊Bombay Brow Bar – 829 Cordova St  Waterfront is beautifully situated just minutes from Gastown and steps from Waterfront Station. This is the perfect @bombaybrowbar location to have a walk-in appointment completed over your lunch break, or during your visit to Vancouver!

💕 Bombay Brow Bar - 951 Park Royal South  West Van is the perfect pit-stop while shopping in the mall for all your skincare and make-up purchases.

🌸 Bombay Brow Bar - 2206 W 4th  Kits is right in the middle of the hub for all our Kitsilano clients. PLUS …a head massage to end your treatment has you leaving feeling beautiful AND relaxed!

👑 Bombay Brow Bar - 1056 Mainland St  Yaletown is in the trendy boutique area of Vancouver, and your flagship location! This is an ideal spot for a quick brow maintenance and a makeover to take you from work to play.

Regardless of which location best suits your needs, we are here to help you shape your brows to perfection. See you soon beauties ❤️
.
